events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the product does not meet my expectations.
System has identified the customer's issue as belonging to the Refund cluster based on keywords detected in the complaint.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah T. for further assistance with the refund request.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue quickly?
Here is my order number 123456789 and the attached photo shows the item I received, which is clearly different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3 to 5 business days.
I appreciate the quick response and the refund offer. That works for me, thank you very much!
The refund has been approved and you will see the amount credited to your account shortly. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We wanted to check in and confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Since no further issues have been reported, we are closing your case. Thank you for contacting customer support!
